text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump owes 14 cities a total of $1.82 million from campaign rallies. 

RNC and Trump campaign committees have $240 million on hand. 

If Trump settled his bills, that would mean more resources when cities need them most. 

They could pay if they wanted to.
https://t.co/1yg9KvYD6P
